name: Protocol (itch) (30x30)
description:
| summary |

You are a crewman aboard Observatory Station Calypso-54414d. Everything you know is a lie.

| details |

  • 48.3k words with code. 
  • Two main routes and 9 possible endings, including 3 secret endings. 
  • New Game + playthroughs possible.

| credits |

Written and coded by 30x30 for Spring Thing 2023. Nominate Protocol for a ribbon or see other entries here. 

  • Template by Nyehilism
  • Twine was created by Chris Klimas
  • The Sugarcube format was created by T. M. Edwards

Special thanks to my writing accountability group for their assistance in getting the game done on time, early readers and playtesters for their willingness in trying to break the code and catching errors, and to my partner, for her endless patience and encouragement in the face of incomprehensible drafts sent in the early hours of the morning.
